com.microsoft.azure.management.network

Interface NicIpConfiguration.Update<ParentT>

  • Type Parameters:
    ParentT - the return type of the final Settable.parent()
    All Superinterfaces:
    Settable<ParentT>
    Enclosing interface:
    NicIpConfiguration

    public static interface NicIpConfiguration.Update<ParentT>
extends Settable<ParentT>
    The template for a ip configuration update operation, containing all the settings that can be modified.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NicIpConfiguration.Update<ParentT> withNewPublicIpAddress()
      Creates a new public IP address in the same region and group as the resource and associate it with the Ip configuration.
      NicIpConfiguration.Update<ParentT> withNewPublicIpAddress(PublicIpAddress.DefinitionCreatable creatable)
      Create a new public IP address to associate the Ip configuration with, based on the provided definition.
      NicIpConfiguration.Update<ParentT> withNewPublicIpAddress(String leafDnsLabel)
      Creates a new public IP address in the same region and group as the resource, with the specified DNS label and associate it with the Ip configuration.
      NicIpConfiguration.Update<ParentT> withoutPublicIpAddress()
      Specifies that remove any public IP associated with the Ip configuration.
      NicIpConfiguration.Update<ParentT> withPrivateIpAddressDynamic()
      Enables dynamic private IP address allocation within the specified existing virtual network subnet for Ip configuration.
      NicIpConfiguration.Update<ParentT> withPrivateIpAddressStatic(String staticPrivateIpAddress)
      Assigns the specified static private IP address within the specified existing virtual network subnet to Ip configuration.
      NicIpConfiguration.Update<ParentT> withSubnet(String name)
      Associate a subnet with the Ip configuration.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.microsoft.azure.management.resources.fluentcore.model.Settable

        parent

    • Method Detail

      • withSubnet

        NicIpConfiguration.Update<ParentT> withSubnet(String name)
        Associate a subnet with the Ip configuration.
        Parameters:
        name - the subnet name
        Returns:
        the next stage of the Ip configuration update

      • withPrivateIpAddressDynamic

        NicIpConfiguration.Update<ParentT> withPrivateIpAddressDynamic()
        Enables dynamic private IP address allocation within the specified existing virtual network subnet for Ip configuration.
        Returns:
        the next stage of the Ip configuration update

      • withPrivateIpAddressStatic

        NicIpConfiguration.Update<ParentT> withPrivateIpAddressStatic(String staticPrivateIpAddress)
        Assigns the specified static private IP address within the specified existing virtual network subnet to Ip configuration.
        Parameters:
        staticPrivateIpAddress - the static IP address within the specified subnet to assign to the Ip configuration
        Returns:
        the next stage of the Ip configuration update

      • withNewPublicIpAddress

        NicIpConfiguration.Update<ParentT> withNewPublicIpAddress(PublicIpAddress.DefinitionCreatable creatable)
        Create a new public IP address to associate the Ip configuration with, based on the provided definition.

        if there is public IP associated with the primary Ip configuration then that will be removed in favour of this

        Parameters:
        creatable - a creatable definition for a new public IP
        Returns:
        the next stage of the Ip configuration update

      • withNewPublicIpAddress

        NicIpConfiguration.Update<ParentT> withNewPublicIpAddress()
        Creates a new public IP address in the same region and group as the resource and associate it with the Ip configuration.

        the internal name and DNS label for the public IP address will be derived from the network interface name, if there is an existing public IP association then that will be removed in favour of this

        Returns:
        the next stage of the Ip configuration update

      • withNewPublicIpAddress

        NicIpConfiguration.Update<ParentT> withNewPublicIpAddress(String leafDnsLabel)
        Creates a new public IP address in the same region and group as the resource, with the specified DNS label and associate it with the Ip configuration.

        the internal name for the public IP address will be derived from the DNS label, if there is an existing public IP association then that will be removed in favour of this

        Parameters:
        leafDnsLabel - the leaf domain label
        Returns:
        the next stage of the Ip configuration update

      • withoutPublicIpAddress

        NicIpConfiguration.Update<ParentT> withoutPublicIpAddress()
        Specifies that remove any public IP associated with the Ip configuration.
        Returns:
        the next stage of the Ip configuration update
